segments.text: I notice the little girl reaching up for a cookie, looking so excited.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She doesn’t seem to realize how dangerous this whole situation is.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her brother is balancing on that stool like a circus act, and she’s just waiting for her treat.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think she trusts him completely, even though he’s about to fall.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water from the sink is getting closer to them, but she doesn’t even look down.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if she’s ever seen someone slip on a wet floor before.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman at the sink is completely unaware of what’s happening right behind her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope they get those cookies and get down before the stool tips over.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is stretching so far, and the stool is already tilting backward.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think they’re both going to end up on the floor if they’re not careful.
segments.speaker: PAR
